Package stocks.view

Class PortfolioViewImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • stocks.view.PortfolioViewImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IViewInterface, PortfolioView
    public class PortfolioViewImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements PortfolioView
    This class implements the methods of PortfolioView which is an interface for text UI.
